org.objectstyle.cayenne.access.util
Class QueryUtils

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--org.objectstyle.cayenne.access.util.QueryUtils
public class QueryUtils
extends java.lang.Object

Implements helper methods that perform different query-related operations. May be deprecated in the future, after its functionality is moved to the places where it is used now.

Author:
Andrei Adamchik

Constructor Detail

QueryUtils

public QueryUtils()
Method Detail

updatedProperties

public static java.util.Map updatedProperties(DataObject dataObject)
Deprecated. Since 1.1 unused

Returns a map of the properties of dataObject which have actually changed compared to the objects commited snapshot. Actual change is determined by using equals() (true implies no change). Will return null if there are no changes

updateQuery

public static UpdateQuery updateQuery(DataObject dataObject)
Deprecated. Unused since 1.1

Returns an update query for the DataObject that can be used to commit object state changes to the database. If no changes are found, null is returned.

deleteQuery

public static DeleteQuery deleteQuery(DataObject dataObject)
Deprecated. Unused since 1.1

Generates a delete query for a specified data object.

insertQuery

public static InsertQuery insertQuery(java.util.Map objectSnapshot,
                                      ObjectId permId)
Deprecated. Unused since 1.1

Generates an insert query for a specified data object.

selectObjectForFlattenedObjectId

public static SelectQuery selectObjectForFlattenedObjectId(QueryEngine e,
                                                           FlattenedObjectId oid)
Deprecated. Since 1.0.1 FlattenedObjectId is deprecated, so this method is deprecated too.

selectObjectForId

public static SelectQuery selectObjectForId(ObjectId oid)
Creates and returns a select query that can be used to fetch an object given an ObjectId.

selectQueryForIds

public static SelectQuery selectQueryForIds(java.util.List oids)
Creates and returns a select query that can be used to fetch a list of objects given a list of ObjectIds. All ObjectIds must belong to the same entity.

selectPrefetchPath

public static PrefetchSelectQuery selectPrefetchPath(QueryEngine e,
                                                     SelectQuery q,
                                                     java.lang.String prefetchPath)
Deprecated. Since 1.1 Use PrefetchSelectQuery constructor.

Creates and returns SelectQuery for a given SelectQuery and relationship prefetching path.

transformQualifier

public static Expression transformQualifier(ObjEntity ent,
                                            Expression qual,
                                            java.lang.String relPath)
Deprecated. Since 1.1 use Entity.translatedForRelatedEntity(Expression, String)

Translates qualifier applicable for one ObjEntity into a qualifier for a related ObjEntity.

Parameters:
ent - the entity to which the original qualifier (qual) applies
qual - the qualifier on ent
relPath - a relationship path from ent to some target entity
Returns:
Expression which, when applied to the target entity of relPath, will give the union of the objects that would be obtained by following relPath from all of the objects in ent that match qual

selectRelationshipObjects

public static SelectQuery selectRelationshipObjects(QueryEngine e,
                                                    DataObject source,
                                                    java.lang.String relName)
Generates a SelectQuery that can be used to fetch relationship destination objects given a source object of a to-many relationship.
